statements: SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE country='USA'
SELECT customer_id, first_name FROM customers WHERE country='Germany' ORDER BY first_name ASC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE favorite_cuisine='Italian' AND country='France'
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, country FROM customers WHERE last_name='Smith'
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE favorite_cuisine = 'Italian' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, favorite_cuisine FROM customers WHERE country = 'France' AND favorite_cuisine <> 'Indian';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE country = 'Canada' ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, favorite_cuisine FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT name, country FROM customers WHERE preference = 'Vegetarian';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE allergies IS NULL;
SELECT id, meal_name, cuisine_type FROM meals WHERE spiciness_level = 'Mild';
SELECT name, preference, allergies FROM customers WHERE country = 'Italy';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT id, name FROM customers WHERE preference = 'Vegetarian' AND country = 'Canada';
SELECT * FROM meals WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian' ORDER BY spiciness_level DESC;
SELECT meal_name, ingredients FROM meals WHERE spiciness_level = 'Mild';
SELECT id, meal_name FROM meals WHERE ingredients LIKE '%Tomato%' AND ingredients LIKE '%Cheese%';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers;
SELECT country, name, email FROM Customers WHERE country='USA';
SELECT * FROM Preferences WHERE spice_level > 3;
SELECT meal_id, main_dish, drink FROM Meals WHERE cuisine='Italian';
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers, country FROM Customers GROUP BY country HAVING total_customers > 1;
SELECT p.cuisine, m.main_dish FROM Preferences p JOIN Meals m ON p.cuisine = m.cuisine WHERE p.spice_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' AND country IN ('USA', 'Canada');
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM Customer WHERE country='USA';
SELECT customer_id, name, country FROM Customer ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Restaurant WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT name, category, price FROM FoodItem WHERE price < 10.00;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE country='USA';
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM Customer ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Restaurant WHERE rating > 4.5 AND location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT name, category, price FROM FoodItem WHERE price < 20 ORDER BY name ASC, price DESC;

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, r.name AS restaurant_name, p.rating FROM Customer c JOIN Preference p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN Restaurant r ON r.cuisine_type = p.cuisine_type WHERE p.rating >= 4 ORDER BY p.rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT cuisine_name, flavor_profile FROM cuisines ORDER BY cuisine_name ASC;
SELECT dish_name, flavor_profile FROM dishes WHERE cuisine_id = 1 AND flavor_profile = 'Spicy' ORDER BY dish_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA';

SELECT customers.first_name, customers.last_name, cuisines.cuisine_name FROM customers JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id JOIN cuisines ON preferences.cuisine_preference = cuisines.cuisine_name WHERE customers.age < 40 AND preferences.spice_level > 3;

SELECT dishes.dish_name, cuisines.cuisine_name, countries.country_name FROM dishes JOIN cuisines ON dishes.cuisine_id = cuisines.cuisine_id JOIN countries ON cuisines.country_name = countries.country_name WHERE dishes.flavor_profile = 'Spicy';

SELECT customers.first_name, preferences.cuisine_preference, preferences.spice_level FROM customers LEFT JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id WHERE preferences.spice_level IS NULL;
